summary: Dark dragon armour, both heavy and light, for both males and females. It looks more like a dragon too!
descriptionHtml:
Retextured dragon armour and made it darker. It looks much cooler than the vanilla. I did both the  light dragon and the heavy dragon armours, for both male and female. It looks more like it came from a dragon as well! All you need is the ability to smith dragon armour, unless you already have some.

INSTALL: Place \"textures\" folder in \"Data\" folder in your skyrim directory.

UNINSTALL: Delete all associated files.
author: thewolfpacisback
